req.summary: The 'Undo' button is disabled after clicking the 'Save' button
req.str: 1. Log in under UserB 2. Select the 'User info' tab 3. Edit Tte information from 'User Name' field 4. Click the 'Save' button 5. Navigate the 'Undo' button
req.act: The 'Undo' button is disabled after clicking the 'Save' button
req.exp: The 'Undo' button is activated after clicking the 'Save' button
